q: " pal PLAY IT NOW: Behind The Scenes Of "The X Factor' With Simon Cowell "She's in the mix," Simon Cowell told Billy Bush and Kit Hoover on Tuesday"s Access Hollywood Live. But a lot of people are in there. This week, Simon Cowell has been blitzing the media, beginning on Sunday with promos for his show, which aired during the Super Bowl, but none of those clips revealed what the Brit will be wearing when

sparring partner at the judging table, the reliably effusive and ditzy Paula Abdul , who had departed the previous season. And Simon Cowell made little secret that he was bored and ready to get on to his next series, The X Factor, "already a hit in Britain and scheduled to launch stateside this fall. Ellen DeGeneres , Ms. Paula Abdul 's replacement, never jelled with the other judges, including singer Kara DioGuardi , who had been brought on for the 2009 season to bolster the show in advance of Ms. Paula Abdul 's expected departure. Now Ms. Ellen DeGeneres and Ms. Kara DioGuardi are both gone. The saga of the "American Idol phenomenon, from its origins in the 2001 hit British series "Pop Idol" right up to Simon Cowell 's departure, is the focus of Richard Rushfield's breezy, gossipy "American Idol: The Untold Story.

The focus needs to be on how they can hire just one more person, he said. As a result, Kirsten Gillibrand told the vets that besides following up on their suggestions, she is working with local chambers of commerce to use existing tax credits that encourage hiring of veterans.

More than anything else I have failed to do," he writes, and even amid my pride in the many important things that we did accomplish, I regret that I did not leave at that point. Fans of Washington insider politics, meanwhile, will find plenty to chew over. Donald Rumsfeld does not hesitate to dish on the personal squabbles that plagued the President Bush administration.
